issue.title: [C++] Add forward compatibility checks for unrecognized future MetadataVersion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9399](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9399). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should have no need of these checks in theory, but they present a safeguard should some years in the future it became necessary to increment the MetadataVersion.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9399?focusedCommentId=17156983) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I ran into some problems and sent an email to the mailing list about it.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9399?focusedCommentId=17157751) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
